snippet.title: Block Factory | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Block Factory!

Block Factory is a production and automation game focusing on creating 3D figurines from building blocks in a factory. 
Shape your models, design and optimize your assembly lines to bring your creations to life!.

Wishlist now and sign up for the playtest: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2827680/Block_Factory/
#blockfactory #shirogames  #automation #factory
---------------------------------
Follow us on social media for news, announcements and more!
Twitter - /   /   / BlockFactory__
Discord - /   /   / https://discord.gg/bWZspKPmhb
Reddit - /   /   / r/BlockFactory
Steam - https://steamcommunity.com/app/2827680
